author: R. Prasad
title: Novel coronavirus can be transmitted even before symptoms show up
description: The existence of presymptomatic or asymptomatic transmission makes contact tracing more challenging
content: A study of seven clusters in Singapore by Vernon J. Lee and others from the Ministry of Health, Singapore, provides some evidence that virus transmission to others (resulting in infection) can happen from one to three days before a person shows symptoms. But … [+3066 chars]
